banner.description: Hi! My name is Vasil, I'm a Front-End Developer with over 3 years of experience, including commercial work. Ready to join your team and create quality websites and applications.

global.desc: Development of a new design and functionality for an internal company project, involving technologies such as Vue.js, Vuex, Webpack, and GitLab, as well as providing support for legacy projects on WordPress.

maxopen.desc: Developing cross-platform web applications using technologies such as HTML, CSS, SCSS, and JavaScript. Experience with version control system Git and enhancing existing products, including both regular websites and WordPress-based websites.

hills.desc: Development of an internal web application for automating routine tasks of managers, technology stack: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Redux Toolkit; backend in Java Spring.

projects.warning: Please be aware that the projects listed below are pet projects, as I am currently only able to add personal projects to this section. Each project showcases different skills and technologies I've worked with. For professional experience and more detailed information, please refer to the other sections of my portfolio.
